
t = int(raw_input())
for q in range(t):
	s = raw_input().split();
	n = int(s[0])
	m = int(s[1])
	arr = [];
	arr.append(1);
	arr.append(1);
	for i in range(2,2*n):
		# print i;
		t = arr[i-1]+arr[i-2];
		t%=m;
		arr.append(t);
	p = arr[(2*n)-2] % m;
	q = arr[(2*n)-1] % m;
	s = str(p)+'/'+str(q);
	print s;
